column5: Hi everyone,  I have had the opportunity to weigh in a monster buck taken just outside of Belleville this week and now it has returned to me for my taxidermy services.  I thought I would post these pics for everyone to see.  This is the hunter that harvested this monster buck.   Here is a pic with Glen holding the monster.   One of our customer's is presently re-constructing our web site and we will have a taxidermy section on our site that will display some of our work.  This buck will definitely be on there when it is completed.  Best regards, Sam
So thats the monster eh... WOW... thats a lot of mass on his head

HUGE!!! Nice Buck and congrats to the hunter!  Too bad it is not riding in style.... being in the back of a GMC and all..... LOL!  Say hello to Glen for us if he is not around Friday afternoon would you Sam?  Thanks!  Gerritt.
Did Glen end up getting a buck this year, or is he still in pursuit of it? Bet both he and you were drooling over that Buck eh?

Hi Gerritt,  Glen is off all week deer hunting......hhhhmmmmmm he was also off last week as well.  I need to talk to the person making the schedules. Glen will be back in on Sunday.........he has run out of vacation leave  Regards, Sam
sure that's not a moose!!
Yup, I'm Jealous...  Just got back after a 5 day hunt...nuttin
that is one nice looking buck congrants i could do with one like that  rob
WOW thats a beaut  WTG to the hunter!!
DANG!!!
We could share it.LOL  Massive mass on that rack. Sam, was it taken by gun or bow?  Thanks for sharing
That's the buck of a lifetime. WOW !!! Lots of mass on the rack. Did it get scored ?
Nice rack! Any idea what that weighed in at?
Awesome buck....kick myself for moving away!
WOW... What a buck, that truly is a magnificent animal. Congrats to the hunter, I dont think he will beat that PB. Post the pic when the deer mount is done.
WoW thats insane  ! that must be close to the NON typeical ontario record ?
I believe this is still the ontario record (for firearms anyway)      http://www.frow.ca/nonmodern.htm
nice rack . .  oh nothing happened .  last time I said nice rack I got a slap in the face
Thats a big boy! Ticked I can't shoot one this year! Oh well next year....
Another recent deer is a 246 pd. buck (dressed weight) taken a bit north of Napanee.  outdoorguy61
wow, that sure is a great one.  any idea of a green score on that bad boy?  way to go hunter.  jason

Hi Everyone,  That buck weighed 246.8 lbs. and I haven't had the opportunity to score the rack yet.  That will be done as soon as the rack is dried and I will also have two more racks of similar size and will post the pics on here as soon as they're available.  Today we weighed in another buck and it weighed in at 253.6 lbs.  Best regards, Sam
That is one monster buck, trophy of a lifetime.
Holy Moly... very nice....
